languages.text: "Груз" — это гора трупов, не числящихся среди членов экипажа. Судя по характеру повреждений, они были умерщвлены мгновенно и безболезненно, после чего каким-то образом доставлены на корабль. Рядом с ними была обнаружена странная рогатая маска ксеносского происхождения".

"The cargo itself is a pile of corpses. None of the people were on the crew manifest. Judging by the injuries, they were killed instantly and painlessly, before somehow being delivered to the ship. Next to them, the crew found a strange horned mask of xenos origin."
languages.original_text: "Груз" — это гора трупов, не числящихся среди членов экипажа. Судя по характеру повреждений, они были умерщвлены мгновенно и безболезненно, после чего каким-то образом доставлены на корабль. Рядом с ними была обнаружена странная рогатая маска ксеносского происхождения".

traits.locale_text: "The item itself is a pile of corpses not specified in the crew list. Judging by the type of injuries they were killed instantly and painlessly, and then delivered to the ship somehow. Next to them crewmen found a strange horned mask of the xenos origin."

"The item itself is a pile of corpses not specified in the crew list. Judging by the type of injuries they were killed instantly and painlessly, and then delivered to the ship somehow. Next to them crewmen found a strange horned mask of the xenos origin."

"The cargo itself is a pile of corpses not accounted for in the crew list. Judging by the injuries they had sustained, they had been killed instantly and painlessly, before somehow being delivered to the ship. Next to them, the crew found a strange horned mask of xenos origins."

"The cargo itself is a pile of corpses not accounted for in the crew list. Judging by the injuries they had sustained, they had been killed instantly and painlessly, before somehow being delivered to the ship. Next to them, the crew found a strange horned mask of xenos origins."

"The cargo itself is a pile of corpses. None of the people were on the crew manifest. Judging by the injuries, they were killed instantly and painlessly, before somehow being delivered to the ship. Next to them, the crew found a strange horned mask of xenos origin."

languages.text: “这些货物是一堆尸体，尸体的身份不在船员名单上。从尸体上的伤势判断，他们是在毫无痛苦的情况下被瞬间杀死，之后通过某种未知方式运上了飞船。在尸体旁边，船员发现了一个古怪的异形面具，上面带着角。”
languages.original_text: "The cargo itself is a pile of corpses. None of the people were on the crew manifest. Judging by the injuries, they were killed instantly and painlessly, before somehow being delivered to the ship. Next to them, the crew found a strange horned mask of xenos origin."

traits.locale_text: “这些货物是一堆尸体，尸体的身份不在船员名单上。从尸体上的伤势判断，他们是在毫无痛苦的情况下被瞬间杀死，之后通过某种未知方式运上了飞船。在尸体旁边，船员发现了一个古怪的异形面具，上面带着角。”

languages.text: « La cargaison en elle-même est un tas de cadavres. Aucune de ces personnes ne figurait sur le manifeste du vaisseau. À en juger par leurs blessures, ils ont été tués instantanément et sans douleur, avant d'être livrés d'une manière ou d'une autre au vaisseau. À côté d'eux, l'équipage a trouvé un masque étrange d'origine xénos. »
languages.original_text: "The cargo itself is a pile of corpses. None of the people were on the crew manifest. Judging by the injuries, they were killed instantly and painlessly, before somehow being delivered to the ship. Next to them, the crew found a strange horned mask of xenos origin."

traits.locale_text: « La cargaison en elle-même est un tas de cadavres. Aucune de ces personnes ne figurait sur le manifeste du vaisseau. À en juger par leurs blessures, ils ont été tués instantanément et sans douleur, avant d'être livrés d'une manière ou d'une autre au vaisseau. À côté d'eux, l'équipage a trouvé un masque étrange d'origine xénos. »

languages.text: "Die Fracht selbst ist ein Haufen Leichen. Keiner dieser Leute war Mitglied der Crew. Den Verletzungen nach wurden sie schnell und schmerzlos getötet, bevor sie irgendwie aufs Schiff gebracht wurden. Neben ihnen fand die Crew eine seltsam gehörnte Maske, wie sie von Xenos getragen wird."
languages.original_text: "The cargo itself is a pile of corpses. None of the people were on the crew manifest. Judging by the injuries, they were killed instantly and painlessly, before somehow being delivered to the ship. Next to them, the crew found a strange horned mask of xenos origin."

traits.locale_text: "Die Fracht selbst ist ein Haufen Leichen. Keiner dieser Leute war Mitglied der Crew. Den Verletzungen nach wurden sie schnell und schmerzlos getötet, bevor sie irgendwie aufs Schiff gebracht wurden. Neben ihnen fand die Crew eine seltsam gehörnte Maske, wie sie von Xenos getragen wird."

"Die Fracht selbst ist ein Leichenhaufen, von dem keine Leiche in der Crewliste aufgeführt ist. Den Verletzungen nach zu urteilen wurden sie kurz und schmerzlos getötet, bevor sie irgendwie aufs Schiff gebracht wurden. Neben ihnen fand die Crew eine seltsam gehörnte Maske, wie sie von Xenos getragen wird."

languages.text: «Este cargamento es un montón de cadáveres. Ninguna de estas personas figura en la lista de tripulantes. A juzgar por sus heridas, los mataron de forma rápida e indolora antes de enviarlos a nuestra nave. La tripulación encontró una extraña máscara xenos con cuernos junto a los cuerpos».
languages.original_text: "The cargo itself is a pile of corpses. None of the people were on the crew manifest. Judging by the injuries, they were killed instantly and painlessly, before somehow being delivered to the ship. Next to them, the crew found a strange horned mask of xenos origin."

traits.locale_text: «Este cargamento es un montón de cadáveres. Ninguna de estas personas figura en la lista de tripulantes. A juzgar por sus heridas, los mataron de forma rápida e indolora antes de enviarlos a nuestra nave. La tripulación encontró una extraña máscara xenos con cuernos junto a los cuerpos».

languages.text: 「積荷は死体の山でした。その中の誰ひとりとして乗組員名簿には載っていませんでした。傷の様子から見て、彼らは即死で苦痛を感じる間もなく殺され、何らかの方法で船に運ばれてきたようです。そのそばで、クルーが異種族由来の奇妙な角付きの仮面を発見しました」
languages.original_text: "The cargo itself is a pile of corpses. None of the people were on the crew manifest. Judging by the injuries, they were killed instantly and painlessly, before somehow being delivered to the ship. Next to them, the crew found a strange horned mask of xenos origin."

traits.locale_text: 「積荷は死体の山でした。その中の誰ひとりとして乗組員名簿には載っていませんでした。傷の様子から見て、彼らは即死で苦痛を感じる間もなく殺され、何らかの方法で船に運ばれてきたようです。そのそばで、クルーが異種族由来の奇妙な角付きの仮面を発見しました」

languages.text: "Gönderi, bir yığın cesetten ibaret. Aralarında mürettebat manifestosundaki isimlerle uyuşan kimse yok. Yaralarına bakılırsa gemiye teslim edilmeden önce çabuk ve acısız bir şekilde öldürülmüşler. Mürettebat; yanlarında zeno menşeli, tuhaf, boynuzlu bir maske de buldu."
languages.original_text: "The cargo itself is a pile of corpses. None of the people were on the crew manifest. Judging by the injuries, they were killed instantly and painlessly, before somehow being delivered to the ship. Next to them, the crew found a strange horned mask of xenos origin."
